bibl.title: Magic and Divination.

series.title: Papers from the Norwegian Institute at Athens.

bibl.note: The close association between magic and divination (specially in the magical papyri), and the prevalence of this association in the minds of Imperial Romans.

bibl.title: The World of Ancient Magic. Papers from the First International Samson Eitrem Seminar at the Norwegian Institute at Athens, 4-8 May 1997

bibl.seg: David R. JORDAN, Hugo MONTGOMERY and Einar THOMASSEN (Edd.), The World of Ancient Magic. Papers from the First International Samson Eitrem Seminar at the Norwegian Institute at Athens, 4-8 May 1997 = Papers from the Norwegian Institute at Athens. 4 (Bergen, 1999) pp. 283-298.
The close association between magic and divination (specially in the magical papyri), and the prevalence of this association in the minds of Imperial Romans.
